name: Hot Buttered Popcorn Crunch

ingredients.name: mixed nuts, such as whole almonds, pecans, and peanuts

preparation: Melt Hot Buttered Rum Mix in fry pan over medium heat.
Add nuts; stir occasionally for 5–7 min until toasted and aromatic.
Meanwhile, place popcorn kernels in a Rectangular Steamer; cover with lid and microwave on high for 2–3 min. Turn into a large bowl; drizzle with oil and sprinkle with seasoning. Toss to mix.
Add warm nuts; toss to mix.
Cool and store mix in an airtight container at room temperature.
tips: Try topping popcorn with unrefined coconut oil; it has a great flavour.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
